Uses of Interface
org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.linux.runtime.LinuxContainerRuntime

  • Packages that use LinuxContainerRuntime 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager  
    org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.linux.runtime  

    • Uses of LinuxContainerRuntime in org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager

      Constructors in org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager with parameters of type LinuxContainerRuntime 
      Constructor and Description
      LinuxContainerExecutor(LinuxContainerRuntime linuxContainerRuntime)
      Create a LinuxContainerExecutor with a provided LinuxContainerRuntime.

    • Uses of LinuxContainerRuntime in org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.linux.runtime

      Classes in org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.linux.runtime that implement LinuxContainerRuntime 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultLinuxContainerRuntime
      This class is a ContainerRuntime implementation that uses the native container-executor binary via a PrivilegedOperationExecutor instance to launch processes using the standard process model.
      class  DelegatingLinuxContainerRuntime
      This class is a ContainerRuntime implementation that delegates all operations to a DefaultLinuxContainerRuntime instance, a DockerLinuxContainerRuntime instance, or a JavaSandboxLinuxContainerRuntime instance depending on whether each instance believes the operation to be within its scope.
      class  DockerLinuxContainerRuntime
      This class is a ContainerRuntime implementation that uses the native container-executor binary via a PrivilegedOperationExecutor instance to launch processes inside Docker containers.
      class  JavaSandboxLinuxContainerRuntime
      This class extends the DefaultLinuxContainerRuntime specifically for containers which run Java commands.
